grade_comment:
**Grade:** 95

**Comment:** This is an excellent response that demonstrates a deep understanding of the significance of the title "King of the Jews" in relation to Jesus' identity as the Messiah. The student provides a thorough analysis of the Old Testament prophecies and their fulfillment in Jesus' life, while also considering the political implications of the title. The conclusion effectively summarizes the importance of this title in understanding Jesus' messianic role.
